title: 1D kinematics - two cars with same acceleration

content.question: Two cars pass by each other on a straight road. Car 1 has a speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math> to the right and Car 2 has the same speed to the left. Immediately after passing each other, both cars experience a constant acceleration <math alttext="a sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> directed to the left. At the instant Car 1 comes to rest, what is the speed <math alttext="v sub 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> of Car 2?

choices.label: <math alttext="0 is less than v sub 2, which is less than 2 v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub 2, equals 2 v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub 2, is greater than 2 v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="v sub 2, equals 2 v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
